abstract: Google has introduced GMail Labs, where its employees can experiment with useful and silly tweaks to its popular e-mail program. It illustrates what is becoming a new truism of Silicon Valley: A community of developers can enrich software with creativity, fun and all sorts of utility. But it is virtually impossible for a mob to keep it simple.
snippet: Google has introduced GMail Labs, where its employees can experiment with useful and silly tweaks to its popular e-mail program. It illustrates what is becoming a new truism of Silicon Valley: A community of developers can enrich software with cre...
lead_paragraph: Two of Silicon Valley’s truisms are increasingly in conflict with each other, and you can see the battle at Google.

headline.main: The Hidden Danger of Gmail Labs
